metadata.Title: CVE-2021-45261 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible.
metadata.Description: An Invalid Pointer vulnerability exists in GNU patch 2.7 via the another_hunk function, which causes a Denial of Service.

notes.Note: rodrigo-zaiden> negligible security impact since it affects the CLI tool with a specific malformed patch file. As of 2022-03-04, upstream has not released any updates nor comments on this issue, marking as deferred.

criterions.comment: patch: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
